original_title: Sri Lanka rupee falls below 329 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 329.15/30 to the US dollar on Monday, from 328.60/80 Friday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.90/14.20 percent from 13.80/14.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.35/50 percent from 14.20/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.40/50 percent from 14.35/45 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.55/70 percent from 14.55/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.30/70 percent, up from 14.10/50 percent. (Colombo/Nov27/2023)
